description:
Toughness, durability, and comfort define the legendary Rydr™ Men’s Pant. Equipped with innovative articulated knee design, the Ryder created a new standard for those that live life on the move. K’s unique dying process delivers a vintage, “lived-in” appearance as fading occurs. Reinforced pockets and bottom cuffs provide extended life to this classic jean style. Home of the original Stealth Cell Phone Pocket™.

***Please Note: Some colors may have a different fabric, slightly altering the finish, including that stitching which may be white, or it may match pants.
name: Kuhl Rydr Pants, 34" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: Exklusive™ Eurotwill 98% Twill Cotton, 2% Lycra 365 g
two front hand, one coin, two back, one stealth cell phone
